channel.description: Recent content in Baz's Clearances: A professional Dorset house clearance Company on

item.title: A guide to our house clearance Dorset services
item.description: A Local Dorset House Clearance Service Baz's Clearances: A …A guide to our house … Baz's Clearances: A …A guide to our house … Dorset House Clearance We have many long-term clients in and around Dorset, as well as further afield, who we have been helping to clear properties and move goods for for several years. One trusted client would only consider us when it came to moving an extremely expensive antique table, and another entrusts us to move specialist items worth five or even six figures.

item.title: How can we contact you? Details below....
item.description: Baz's Clearances: A …How can we contact you? … Contact us We can come round at short notice and give you a no-commitment quotation If you prefer, get in touch by email Your Email: Your Query: Send +44 7793 251 677 info@bazclearance.co.uk 92 Church Rd, Ferndown, BH22 9EX Weekdays 7:30-20:00 Saturdays 7:30-18:00, Sundays 11:00-1700 Landline 01202 896289 Alternate number 07915019222 Contact us 92 Church Rd Ferndown Dorset BH22 9EX

item.description: Baz's Clearances: A … Contact us Get in touch for a quote and advice on any house clearance If you prefer, get in touch by email Your Email: Your Query: Send +44 7793 251 677 info@bazclearance.co.uk Contact us 92 Church Rd Ferndown Dorset BH22 9EX

item.title: These are our openinghours
item.description: Baz's Clearances: A … Our Availability weekdays: start: 7.30 am end: 8.00 pm sat: start: 7.30 am end: 6.00 pm sun: start: 11.00 am end: 5.00 pm telephone: 07793 251 677

item.title: What areas do you cover, besides Dorset, Bournemouth & Poole, etc?
item.description: Baz's Clearances: A …What areas do you cover, … Dorset House Clearance We are based in Ferndown just on the periphery of Poole & Bournemouth; this means we are essentially a Dorset House Clearance Company…but of course we can work further afield. We are available as per the image postcodes [ SP, SO, DT, BH, PO ] so essentially throughout Dorset & into Hampshire —> Bournemouth, Poole, Christchurch, St Leonard’s, Ringwood, Verwood, Wimbourne, Blandford Forum, Shaftesbury, Sherborne, Dorchester, Weymouth, Swanage, Wareham, Southampton, Portsmouth, Lyndhurst, Lymington, New Milton, Winchester, Petersfield, Andover, Gosport, Eastleigh, Havant - and we also can work as far away as Yeovil & Salisbury.

item.title: A link to our Google reviews - and also feel free to leave one!
item.description: Our Reputation Page Baz's Clearances: A … Our Customers’ Experiences So Far Stephen Fowlet Google Review Baz made a great job in clearing out my mother's house. Very tidy work at a reasonable price taking care not to damage the paintwork. Stuart Millar Google Review Used Dorset House clearance recently, very reliable and offer an excellent service. I was most impressed and would not hesitate using there services again in the future or recommending them.

item.title: cta
item.description: We are available on 07793 251 677 On the mobile? Just click the phone icon - Or Send us an Email

item.title: FAQ's: A list of some frequently asked questions
item.description: Baz's Clearances: A … Frequently Asked Questions These are some of the most common questions and requirements we receive. If your query is not covered, then don’t hesitate to get in touch About Us Which areas do you cover? We work in a 40 mile radius of Bournemouth where we are based. So Dorset, Hampshire, and up to Yeovil and Salisbury. Who are your clients? Our clients fall into the following categories – Home Owners, Landlords, Property Management Companies, Housing Associations, Estate Agents, Solicitors, Local Authorities, and Builders.

item.title: features
item.description: Our Services Residential & Commercial Available for residential & commercial properties throughout Dorset - including Bournemouth, Poole & environs. Quotation We work to the customer’s specifications. Just explain what you want done and how you want it done, and we will implement it. Our quotations are not exorbitant. We give competitive, reasonable quotations Waste We are registered with the environmental agency (as legally required); our Waste Carrier Registration is: CBDU508787. All rubbish is correctly & legally disposed of.

item.title: Meet Baz and Marcus
item.description: Baz's Clearances: A …Meet Baz and Marcus Us at Work Who We Are We are a core team of two, myself Baz, and Marcus. You can see us in the pictures, or on Facebook by clicking the Facebook social icon in the footer. We both have considerable experience doing courier work running things round the country, (you can see my Shiply profile in the icons), and now we operate locally - rather than running all over the country - doing house clearances.

item.title: Our Privacy policy
item.description: Baz's Clearances: A … Privacy Policy At Baz’s Clearances, we handle your personal data with care and due diligence. Our privacy policy explains how and when we collect and use your personal information, and how we protect your privacy and security. If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us. General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) We are a Data Controller of your information.

item.title: Terms And Conditions
item.description: Baz's Clearances: A … Terms & Conditions By booking a clearance and using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions, which govern your use of our website and our services. Definitions “You”, “User” or “the customer” refers to any individual or entity that uses our website or our services. “We,” “Us,”, “Our” or “the supplier” refers to Baz’s Clearances. “Services” refers to the removal services that we provide.
